author: dmitrijus
body:
A few months ago I did a simple test to test whether
having a huge library for all the DQM packages (instead of
.so per package) yield any performance results.

It did not.

However, I had to do some cleanup of the code in order to link it
correctly (mostly duplicate symbols):
1. L1TMenuHelper*.cc got de-duplicated;
2. add a proper headers, instead of including .cc (yeah, i know, crazy);
3. adding a few "static" keywords.
title: Minor fixes for DQM classes.
